alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 2:05PM CST until December 15 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CST FOR RICE...LINCOLN AND ELLSWORTH COUNTIES... At 204 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Victor to near Bushton, moving northeast at 50 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS. HAZARD...70 to 80 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Ellsworth, Sterling, Wilson, Kanopolis, Lincoln, Little River, Chase, Holyrood, Sylvan Grove, Bushton, Geneseo, Beverly, Alden, Lorraine, Raymond, Barnard, Frederick, Ash Grove and Westfall. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
